Charles Woodson has been impressed with Tramon Williams , who took over for Al Harris at cornerback and clinched the wild-card win vs. the Philadelphia Eagles by intercepting Michael Vick in the end zone to preserve a 21-16 lead. He's playing lights-out football, Charles Woodson said of Tramon Williams on Fox's Sunday telecast.
